channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-11961] InfluxDBIOIT failing with unauthorized error
item.description:
InfluxDBIOIT failing with unauthorized. It's perma-red.

e.g. https://ci-beam.apache.org/job/beam_PerformanceTests_InfluxDbIO_IT/152/consoleFull

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Cham are you familiar with this test setup?

 

/cc amyrvold
Assigning to the author of this IT.
